text:
[Verse]
Under the moonlight
City's asleep
Walking alone now
Dreams are so deep

[Verse 2]
Neon lights flicker
Shadows that play
Whispers of night time
Guiding my way

[Chorus]
Midnight wanderer
Lost in the night
Following stars
Till morning light

[Verse 3]
Empty streets echo
Steps of my feet
Heart whispers secrets
Rhythm so sweet

[Verse 4]
Subway cars rumble
Echo my thoughts
Life's in the silence
Caught in the knots

[Chorus]
Midnight wanderer
Lost in the night
Following stars
Till morning light
title: Midnight Wanderer
